synopsis.text: Earth meets the extraordinary when a spirited 12-year-old girl, Eri Kasuga, encounters two endearing extraterrestrial beings from the distant planet Mahl. Chinpui, a mouse-like creature, and Wanderyu, who resembles a dog, embark on a mission to find the perfect bride for their royal prince. To their delight, they select Eri as the ideal candidate. However, Eri's reluctance to marry a prince she's never met leads to a charming and humorous series of attempts by the aliens to persuade her. As Eri grapples with the prospect of leaving her life on Earth behind, Wanderyu and Chinpui work tirelessly to convince her to accept her interstellar destiny. Will Eri embrace this cosmic proposal, or will she remain steadfast in her earthly roots? Join Eri and her alien companions in this heartwarming tale of love, friendship, and the vastness of the universe.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
